message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. I believe it would greatly benefit someone like yourself. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the quality of the product but also the exclusivity and the potential benefits it could bring to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I'm also looking to save some money. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but we're unable to match it due to the cost of production and the value we place on our products. However, I'd like to propose a compromise. Would you be open to considering $140 for the product? This still allows us to cover our costs while offering a better deal than our initial offer to you.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $140. Would you be willing to meet me at $130? I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to stay within my budget
